data.title: ANNOUNCING THE 2017 SCHOLASTIC ART & WRITING AWARDS NATIONAL MEDALISTS!
data.text: ANNOUNCING THE 2017 SCHOLASTIC ART & WRITING AWARDS NATIONAL MEDALISTS! Student & Educator National Medalists: Please log into your account at artandwriting.org/login to review required next steps to accept your award(s). Important Note for Educators: If one of your students is a National Medalist listed below, but you do not have a Scholastic Awards account or you do not see any information about your students' awards in your account, please email nationalawards@artandwriting.org. In your email, be sure to include the title and work ID number of your student’s works as listed on this document. The following list is sorted by the student’s home state and then by last name. State Last Name First Name Grade Award Category Title (ID number) AE Correa Krystal 8 Silver Medal Flash Fiction The Voices (12475787) AK Chang Feng-Ching 12 American Visions Medal Painting sketchy (12539192) AK Chang Feng-Ching 12 Silver Medal Mixed Media dangerous (12563867) AK Chang Feng-Ching 12 Silver Medal Art Portfolio consider humanity (12563874) AK Swan Reeve 12 Silver Medal Sculpture Lion Fish (12568067) AL Adams Laura 12 Silver Medal Photography Greta (12512593) AL Bae Sally 11 Gold Medal Painting Flesh (12464988) AL Black Elizabeth 12 Gold Medal Painting Harley (12382281) AL Blokh Daniel 10 Gold Medal Personal Essay & Memoir To Walk On (12267389) AL Blokh Daniel 10 Silver Medal Novel Writing Things a Face Can Hide When Turned Away (12269993) AL Castaneda Elisa 11 Silver Medal Drawing & Illustration More Than a Pretty Picture (12365267) AL Ellis Tori 9 Gold Medal Short Story The Shadow of Bryce Wellington (12393609) AL Kent Emily 12 Silver Medal Painting Behind the Scenes (12239848) AL Kent Emily 12 Silver Medal Painting Lines (12240316) Scholastic Art & Writing Awards Page 1 of 130 557 Broadway New York, NY 10012 | artandwriting.org v. 3/13/2017 6:00 PM
